SCRIPT.MSCRI:
@echo off SET ERROR=0
!------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS -------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
! Selenium server path : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Selenium server path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SLM_SERVER_FILE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Test suite file : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Test suite file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SLM_SUITE_FILE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Test result file : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Test result file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SLM_RESULT_FILE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Application URL : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Application URL" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SLM_AUT_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Browser : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Browser" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SLM_BROWSER#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Advanced options : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Advanced options" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_SLM_OPTIONS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! logging start of execution : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!------------------changing the directory to agent's temp directory------------------------------------------------ : SET &AGENT_TEMPDIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) cd /d "&AGENT_TEMPDIR#" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Unable to change the directory to agent's temp directory" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE
!------------------------------------ Validation of files -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
! ------------------ (Selenium server path)------------------- : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SLM_SERVER_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_FILE_EXISTS
! -------------------- (Test suite file)------------------------ : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SLM_SUITE_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_FILE_EXISTS
! ---------------------(Test result file)--------------------- : IF &UC4RB_SLM_RESULT_FILE# = "" ! getting the temp directory of agent : SET &RESULT_TEMPFILE# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,'testresult-&$RUNID#.html') : ELSE : SET &RESULT_TEMPFILE# = &UC4RB_SLM_RESULT_FILE# : ENDIF
! getting the directory where the result file should be created : SET &RESULT_TEMPFILE# = STR_SUB(&RESULT_TEMPFILE#, "/", "\") : SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&RESULT_TEMPFILE#,"\") : IF &POS# GT 0 : SET &LEN# = STR_LENGTH(&RESULT_TEMPFILE#) : SET &POS# = &POS# - 1 : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = STR_CUT(&RESULT_TEMPFILE#,1,&POS#) ! check if the file path is valid : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_DIR_EXISTS : ELSE : STOP MSG, 51, "Invalid directory [&RESULT_TEMPFILE#]" : ENDIF
! escape charcters : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &RESULT_TEMPFILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : PSET &TEST_RESULT_FILE# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
! change all the "\\" to "\" : SET &DEL_FILE# = &TEST_RESULT_FILE# : SET &CHECK_SLASH# = 1 : WHILE &CHECK_SLASH# GT 0 : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&DEL_FILE#,"\\") : IF &POS# GT 0 : SET &DEL_FILE# = STR_SUB(&DEL_FILE#, "\\", "\") : ELSE : SET &CHECK_SLASH#=0 : ENDIF : ENDWHILE
! delete the file if it already exists IF EXIST &DEL_FILE# ( del &DEL_FILE# ) SET ERROR=%ERRORLEVEL%
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Unable to delete the test result file." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE
!---------------------------------- Creating command to execute test suite ------------------------------
! preparing command to run a test suite : SET &UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD# = "java -jar"
! Selenium server path : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SLM_SERVER_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Browser : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SLM_BROWSER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD#, " -htmlSuite &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! AUT URL : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SLM_AUT_URL# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Test suite file, test result file, advanced options : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SLM_SUITE_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# &TEST_RESULT_FILE# &UC4RB_SLM_OPTIONS#")
echo CMDLET: &UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD# &UC4RB_SLM_RUN_CMD#
!--------------------------------get absolute path, check error and if the result file exist------------------------ ! Check if result file exist IF NOT EXIST &TEST_RESULT_FILE# ( SET ERROR=1 goto :endfile )
!check its size call :setsize &TEST_RESULT_FILE# IF %SIZE% LEQ 0 ( SET ERROR=1 goto :endfile )
!get the absolute path call :getabsolutefile "&RESULT_TEMPFILE#" goto :endfile
:setsize set SIZE=%~z1 EXIT /B 0
:getabsolutefile SET OUTPUTFILEPATH=%~f1 echo UC4RB_SLM_RESULT_FILE_PATH::=%OUTPUTFILEPATH% EXIT /B 0
:endfile
!-------------------------------------------ERROR MESSAGE------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** RUN TEST SUITE ACTION FAILED ********" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE
!-------------------------------------------SUCCESS MESSAGE------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** RUN TEST SUITE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: ! Publishing output file path in case of success : PSET &UC4RB_SLM_RESULT_FILE_PATH# = "" : PSET &UC4RB_SLM_TOTAL_TEST_CASES# ="" : PSET &UC4RB_SLM_PASSED_CASES# ="" : PSET &UC4RB_SLM_FAILED_CASES# ="" :PSET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :IF &STATUS# = 0 ! get the report file : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_SLM_RESULT_FILE_PATH*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : p "key : &KEY#" : p "val : &VALUE#" : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_SLM_RESULT_FILE_PATH" : SET &UC4RB_SLM_RESULT_FILE_PATH# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_SLM_RESULT_FILE_PATH#,,"WORKFLOW" ! Publishing total no. of cases, successful cases and failure cases : SET &UC4RB_SLM_FILE_PATH# = &UC4RB_SLM_RESULT_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.READ_FILE : SET &UC4RB_SLM_CONTENT# = &UC4RB_SLM_FILE_CONTENT# ! get total number of test cases executed : SET &UC4RB_SLM_NODE# = "numTestTotal:" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.PARSE_RESULT : SET &UC4RB_SLM_TOTAL_TEST_CASES# = &UC4RB_SLM_VALUE# : PUBLISH &UC4RB_SLM_TOTAL_TEST_CASES#,,"WORKFLOW" ! get total number of cases that has passed : SET &UC4RB_SLM_NODE# = "numTestPasses:" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.PARSE_RESULT : SET &UC4RB_SLM_PASSED_CASES# = &UC4RB_SLM_VALUE# : PUBLISH &UC4RB_SLM_PASSED_CASES#,,"WORKFLOW" ! get total number of cases that has failed : SET &UC4RB_SLM_NODE# = "numTestFailures:" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SELENIUM.PUB.INCLUDE.PARSE_RESULT : SET &UC4RB_SLM_FAILED_CASES# = &UC4RB_SLM_VALUE# : PUBLISH &UC4RB_SLM_FAILED_CASES#,,"WORKFLOW" : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
